title: Robert Calvert - Captain Lockheed and The St (1974) [FLAC]
description:
Robert Calvert (ex-Hawkwind) - Captain Lockheed and The Starfighters (1974/2007)

Genre: UK, Prog Rock, Space Rock

Tracklist:

2. The Aerospaceage Inferno 4:05

8. The Song Of The Gremlin (Part One) 3:15
9. Ground Crew (Last Minute Reassembly Before Take Off) 2:50

12. Ejection 3:30
13. Interview 3:45
